techmeme.title: Sources: Huawei has approached some clients about testing the technical feasibility of the Ascend 910D, its newest AI chip that it hopes will beat Nvidia's H100 (Wall Street Journal)
A look at the rise of "pure play" bitcoin companies like Twenty One, as the stock market is paying far more for crypto exposure than the crypto market itself is (Matt Levine/Bloomberg)
India faces a shortage of agentic AI professionals, with executives estimating fewer than 100K in the country while demand is projected to hit ~200K by 2026 (Prachi Verma/The Economic Times)
Experts say that India is behind China in deep tech innovation due to its historical focus on services, lower R&D investment, and a brain drain of AI talent (Furquan Ameen/Rest of World)
Trump's tariffs could slow robot adoption in the US, as demand weakens and supplies of components from China, like magnets and precision bearings, are disrupted (Financial Times)
